Motion of the sun

02 Oct 2011

How is the sun moving, according to our latitude, the time of the day and the time of the year? Just take a look at astro.unl.edu and find it out! [caption id="attachment_3601" align="aligncenter" width="400" caption="Motions of the sun"][/caption]
